Phase5Description: The Drowned population has been lessened along the shore. I should return to Aigidh and tell her they can resume fishing.
Phase4Description:
Drowned are invading the Northshore, landlocking the fishermen. The villagers of Marowen rely on fish to keep themselves fed. If the problem isnâ€™t dealt with, they risk starvation.

One fisherman, Aigidh, hired me to hunt the Drowned along the Cursed Scarpes.
Toast: Shambling hordes of the drowned threaten Marowen's livelihood.
Name: Stemming the Tide
